beer.beer_description:
Hi everyone, for this beer description, we’re going live to our travelling beer correspondent to tell you everything you need to know about this new Oat Cream IPA! 
Alright, let’s do it!
I’M here to tell you about this delicious Oat Cream IPA.
Guess what? You’re going to like it… we hope.
It tastes like fruit. It has Cryo Mosaic, Citra, Cashmere and Sabro hops giving it a flavour profile of a tropical fruit platter with a velvety texture.
It has coconuts and mango and melon. It’s just like sweet berry wine.

items.badge_description: You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 250 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 51!

Milkshake IPAs and Pale Ales are one of the trendiest styles right now. Who knew fruit, lactose, and hops would blend so well together?  You’ve checked-in to 25 different Milkshake style IPA’s or Pale Ales. Try 5 more for Level 6!

items.badge_description: While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 50 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 11!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 20 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 5!
